meanings.definition: Stargazes: to look at or observe the stars
meanings.sent1: At night, she stargazes from her backyard.
meanings.sent2: He often stargazes to appreciate the beauty of the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The cat stargazes through the window, dreaming of space adventures.
meanings.sent4: Her mind stargazes, lost in the vastness of the universe.
meanings.sent5: Stargazing on a clear night can be a peaceful experience.

meanings.definition: Stargazes: someone who looks at or observes the stars
meanings.sent1: The stargazes brought their telescopes to the astronomy club meeting.
meanings.sent2: As a dedicated stargazes, she knew all the constellations by heart.
meanings.sent3: The little stargazes in the group pointed excitedly at the shooting star.
meanings.sent4: The wise old stargazes shared stories of the stars with the children.
meanings.sent5: The stargazes' passion for the night sky was contagious.
